label: 後七日御修法記
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Record of the Latter Seven-Day Rite conducted in 1141, written between that time and 1153. Though the author is unknown, it was probably Kanjin, the leading officiant that year, or someone close to him.
